channel.title: Plyr on Abhijit Dasgupta
channel.description: Recent content in Plyr on Abhijit Dasgupta

item.title: The split-apply-combine paradigm in R
item.description: Last night at the DC R Users meetup, which was our largest meetup to date, I gave an introductory presentation on data munging, and spent a bit of time on the split-apply-combine paradigm that I use almost daily in my work. I talked mainly about the packages plyr and doBy, which I use a lot now. David Smith posted a link on the Revolution blog to this article by Steve Miller, talking about the virtues of the data.
